name: XWUI Aspect Ratio Component
description: Container component that maintains a specific aspect ratio for its content. Supports preset ratios (1:1, 4:3, 16:9, etc.) or custom numeric ratios. Useful for images, videos, and responsive layouts.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

ratio.description: Aspect ratio preset (1:1, 4:3, 16:9, 21:9, 3:2, 2:3, 9:16) or custom numeric ratio (width/height)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the aspect ratio container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element to display within the aspect ratio container
